Short description: Classification of the anatomical extent of spread in solid tumor cancer.
Complete description: The TNM system classifies the amount and spread of cancer in a patient’s body (solid tumors only). T describes the size of the tumor and any spread of cancer into nearby tissue; N describes spread of cancer to nearby lymph nodes; and M describes metastasis (spread of cancer to other parts of the body
